title: Uppsala Monitoring Centre
author: Uppsala Monitoring Centre
cleaned_text: Latest news Working for a better world In our role as a WHO Collaborating Centre, we provide training, guidance and support to countries in the WHO Programme for International Drug Monitoring (WHO PIDM). We also manage VigiBase, WHO's database of reported potential side effects of medicinal products - the largest database of its kind in the world.
